content.p: Being a University of Nottingham and Faculty of Science alumnus you'll automatically become part of our alumni community, a global network of over 250,000 former students who support both current students and each other. From professional networking and mentoring and events and career tips, there are lots of great reasons to keep in touch and get involved. Watch our alumni videos Join a global network of former students, build social and business networks, participate in volunteering and mentoring opportunities and access a wide range of special alumni events. Visit the University's alumni website UoN Alumni on Facebook Would you like to come back to your school as a visiting speaker? Our current cohort would love to hear your career story. Please get in touch if you would like to give a talk. The University of Nottingham University Park Nottingham, NG7 2RD
